医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基于深度学习的手持设备改善心房颤动检测宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。症状驱动的心电图（ECG）记录在检测消融后心房颤动复发（AFR）方面发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Deep-learning-based-handheld-device-improves-atrial-fibrillation-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Deep-learning-based-handheld-device-improves-atrial-fibrillation-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2153b090-01a8-43f0-b330-01796e4f9fe9 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 12:10:13 -0400
刺破手指的血液样本可以检测阿尔茨海默病的生物标志物AAIC 2023 上首次报道的技术和实践进步证明了阿尔茨海默氏症血液生物标志物的简单性、可运输性和诊断价值，包括未来由患者或家庭成员在家进行检测的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Finger-prick-blood-sample-can-detect-Alzheimers-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Finger-prick-blood-sample-can-detect-Alzheimers-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93472551-b63e-4b45-a2d7-eb3406be5662 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 11:07:14 -0400 Finger prick blood sample can detect Alzheimer's biomarkers
肠道细菌可能在认知能力下降中发挥作用另外两项研究定义了与痴呆风险增加相关的特定肠道细菌，以及可能具有神经保护作用的肠道细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Gut-bacteria-may-play-a-role-in-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Gut-bacteria-may-play-a-role-in-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8858b331-0984-4dd5-8235-bf5184468aef Wed, 19 Jul 2023 11:04:21 -0400 Gut bacteria may play a role in cognitive decline
乳腺癌治疗与更快的生物衰老有关美国国立卫生研究院研究人员及其合作者的一项新研究表明，与未患乳腺癌的女性相比，被诊断和治疗乳腺癌的女性的生物衰老速度加快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Breast-cancer-treatment-linked-to-faster-biological-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Breast-cancer-treatment-linked-to-faster-biological-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63ae0138-0cb9-4c5f-ba0b-e602d8cc1829 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 10:53:52 -0400 Breast cancer treatment linked to faster biological aging
用于分子诊断的 PCR 样品管理解决方案Ziath 的 Mirage 2D 条形码阅读器经过优化，可读取 4titude 的 individual Access 2D 编码 PCR 板，这两个项目均属于马萨诸塞州伯灵顿 Azenta Life Sciences 的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/PCR-sample-management-solution-for-molecular-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/PCR-sample-management-solution-for-molecular-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7bd08fe-6af4-4261-9f61-c8b0b21539e3 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 10:36:00 -0400 PCR sample management solution for molecular diagnostics
医生敦促开展更多关于使用裸盖菇素和其他迷幻药治疗女性癌症困扰的研究《国际杂志》在线发表的一篇评论中敦促医生们，是时候停止搪塞并探索使用裸盖菇素（“迷幻蘑菇”中的活性成分）和其他迷幻药来缓解晚期妇科癌症女性所面临的压倒性痛苦了。妇科癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Doctors-urge-more-research-on-the-use-of-psilocybin-and-other-psychedelics-for-womene28099s-cancer-distress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Doctors-urge-more-research-on-the-use-of-psilocybin-and-other-psychedelics-for-womene28099s-cancer-distress.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69ba85af-d635-47b9-8a36-683607ec1628 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 10:28:43 -0400 Doctors urge more research on the use of psilocybin and other psychedelics for women’s cancer distress
分析显示，自 2019 年以来，英格兰的跨境烟草购买量增加了两倍自 2019 年以来，英国吸烟者从免税或产品更便宜的国家购买折扣烟草（即所谓的跨境购买）的比例增加了两倍，从略高于 5% 上升至略高于 16% ，但据报道，黑市购买量没有变化，《烟草控制》杂志在线发表的时间趋势分析显示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Cross-border-tobacco-purchases-have-tripled-in-England-since-2019-analysis-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Cross-border-tobacco-purchases-have-tripled-in-England-since-2019-analysis-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee52f6e0-e682-434b-95de-c005a175ff09 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 10:14:50 -0400 Cross-border tobacco purchases have tripled in England since 2019, analysis reveals
新型生物传感器可以快速且廉价地识别有骨质疏松症风险的人随着全球预期寿命的延长，骨质疏松症等与年龄相关的疾病的影响也越来越大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-biosensor-could-quickly-and-inexpively-identify-people-at-risk-for-osteoporosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-biosensor-could-quickly-and-inexpively-identify-people-at-risk-for-osteoporosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cac34516-c65b-4d85-8121-57d567b96c65 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 09:56:55 -0400 New biosensor could quickly and inexpensively identify people at risk for osteoporosis
心脏康复与手术后死亡风险降低有关对于数百万接受心脏手术或经历心血管并发症（如心脏病发作或心力衰竭）的美国人来说，可能会鼓励他们参与心脏康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Cardiac-rehabilitation-linked-to-decreased-risk-of-death-years-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Cardiac-rehabilitation-linked-to-decreased-risk-of-death-years-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15a557bf-b8c7-457a-bc2d-2a5fb5f3dc36 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 09:50:00 -0400 Cardiac rehabilitation linked to decreased risk of death after surgery
在初步体外测试中，浓缩咖啡化合物可抑制 tau 蛋白聚集无论是单独享用还是与拿铁、美式咖啡甚至马提尼混合享用，浓缩咖啡都能为咖啡爱好者提供超浓缩的咖啡因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Espresso-compounds-inhibit-tau- Protein-aggregation-in-preliminary-in-vitro-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Espresso-compounds-inhibit-tau- Protein-aggregation-in-preliminary-in-vitro-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58f666fc-eb79-48de-90e4-120735eca603 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 09:39:31 -0400 Espresso compounds inhibit tau protein aggregation in preliminary in vitro tests
